snippet: A coalition airstrike in a province north of Kabul killed at least two villagers, prompting President Hamid Karzai to order an inquiry.
abstract: Coalition airstrike in a province north of Kabul kills at least two Afghan villagers, prompting Pres Hamid Karzai to order an official inquiry and escalating tensions yet again between the allies over civilian deaths.
lead_paragraph: A coalition airstrike in a province north of Kabul killed at least two villagers, prompting President Hamid Karzai to order an inquiry.

headline.main: Tensions Between Afghanistan and U.S. Increase as Airstrike Kills Civilians
headline.print_headline: Tensions Between Afghanistan and U.S. Increase as Airstrike Kills Civilians
